review_text: The place is awesome. I went here to observe Forest School Cebu. The kids are able to appreciate nature because of how the place was built and maintained.
Good for family and friends to celebrate
Good place for jogging. There is entrance fee and parking for your vehicle. Good fresh air because of the trees.

An affordable venue for Family outing.  You can hike here,  run,  jog,  play Frisbee or badminton, swim or just spend time alone or with family in nature setting.  Sayang lang wala na ang mini Zoo. ‚Ä¶
It's really nice place and quite close to everything
It was a breath of fresh air but I just hope they would take care of the animals left there.
Best place to walk with dogs.

Been there 1st week of March 2022 and the park has not fully opened yet due to typhoon Odette. Their pool and mini zoo was still close but nevertheless, kids still enjoyed running freely at the park.
Super nice place to relax, unwind and enjoy.
Nothing spectacular. Just a wide open space to walk around and it also has a small zoo. I hope they can add more features and amenities.

Perfect for outdoor activities that require wide space. I jog here every other day. Place is very relaxing and air is so fresh since the place is surrounded by trees.

It's a piece of nature in the middle of the city. It's no longer that enjoyable compare to when they just opened. During the pandemic they are open 5am to 6pm and this place has been open now for people who wants to jog and stay fit with a taste of nature. Skateboarders or longboarders also hangout here.
Many activities to be done has also a manmade forest
Park is still closed due to covid19 restrictions. Guard was very polite and said that they are still waiting for the go signal to open the park.
Very close to nature but there are times that some parts of the park, like the pool, is crowded.

Good ambiance and the venue is so refreshing. Best place to bond with your family, friends and relatives. Thumbs up!

There's a lot of space in the FAMILY PARK. It's the perfect place to bond with your family and let the kids play on the vast ground. It's so nice in there, you should try to visit it. You can play volleyball, frisbee and other sports. You can also see animals, like the monkeys and snakes.
Nice place for family bounding relax with nature very accessible to go.
Nice Park. You can fly your Drone

I come here to run and listen to the chirping birds. Entrance is sometimes P10, other times P15.

The place is big. It is suitable for family day events. The place is also very relaxing since it is surrounded with many green trees. You can also have pictorials for prenuptial, debut and the like in the mini forest that surrounds the park, since it has nice view.
It's a big forest with in the city , you can jog with fresh air compared to jogging in the street
This place is surrounded by nature, and they also have a mini zoo. Great place to relax.
